foods.description: ORIGINAL THIN CRUST THE SAUSAGE & PEPPERONI TOSS PIZZA, SAUSAGE & PEPPERONI TOSS
foods.lowercaseDescription: original thin crust the sausage & pepperoni toss pizza, sausage & pepperoni toss
foods.ingredients: CRUST: WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, SOYBEAN OIL, PALM OIL, SALT, YEAST, SUGAR, CALCIUM PROPIONATE, L-CYSTEINE. LOW MOISTURE, MOZZARELLA CHEESE: PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES, POWDERED CELLULOSE (TO PREVENT CAKING). SAUCE: TOMATO SAUCE (WATER, TOMATO PASTE), SALT, SPICES, DEHYDRATED GARLIC. SWEET ITALIAN SAUSAGE: PORK, WATER, SALT, SPICES, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, PAPRIKA, FLAVORING, DISODIUM INOSINATE AND DISODIUM GUANYLATE, BHA, BHT, PROPYL GALLATE. MOZZARELLA CHEESE: PASTEURIZED MILK, VINEGAR, ENZYMES, SALT. PEPPERONI: PORK, BEEF, SALT, WATER, DEXTROSE, SPICES, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA, GARLIC POWDER, SODIUM NITRITE, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID. SAUSAGE: BEEF, PORK, WATER, SALT, SPICES, GARLIC POWDER. PEPPERONI: PORK, BEEF, SALT, SPICES, DEXTROSE, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA, FLAVORING, SODIUM NITRITE, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM ASCORBATE. PROVOLONE CHEESE: PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES, POWERED CELLULOSE (TO PREVENT CAKING). SPICES, PARSLEY.

foods.ingredients: MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), CRUST [ENRICHED FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRITE, RIBOFLAVIN, ENZYME, FOLIC ACID), WATER, SOYBEAN OIL, YEAST, DEXTROSE, CALCIUM PROPIONATE (PRESERVATIVE), SALT, DOUGH CONDITIONER (SODIUM METABISULFITE) AND SOY LECITHIN], SAUCE (VINE RIPENED FRESH TOMATOES, SALT, GARLIC POWDER, ONIONS, OREGANO, BASIL, FENNEL, BLACK PEPPER, RED PEPPER, NATURALLY DERIVED CITRIC ACID), PEPPERONI (PORK, BEEF, SALT, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF DEXTROSE, FLAVORINGS, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA, SODIUM NITRITE, SPICES, WATER, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID), SEASONED ROMANO CHEESE (PASTEURIZED COW'S MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES, OREGANO, AND ANTI-CAKING AGENT (POWDERED CELLULOSE).
foods.allHighlightFields:
Brand Owner: CHANTICLEAR PIZZA
Ingredients: , OREGANO, BASIL, FENNEL, BLACK PEPPER, RED PEPPER, NATURALLY DERIVED CITRIC ACID), PEPPERONI (PORK, BEEF

foods.ingredients: GLUTEN FREE CRUST (WATER, RICE FLOUR, POTATO STARCH, OLIVE OIL, HONEY, TAPIOCA FLOUR, FRESH YEAST, SALT), WHOLE MILK MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED WHOLE MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES, POWDERED CELLULOSE [TO PREVENT CAKING]), TOMATO PUREE (TOMATOES, SALT, CITRIC ACID), PEPPERONI (PORK, BEEF, SEA SALT, NATURAL CANE SUGAR, SPICES, PAPRIKA, NATURAL FLAVORINGS, GARLIC POWDER, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE), SPICES, IMPORTED PECORINO ROMANO CHEESE ([PASTEURIZED SHEEP'S MILK, CULTURES, SALT, STARCH], POWDERED CELLULOSE [TO PREVENT CAKING]), EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL, SUGAR, SALT, GARLIC POWDER.
